messages.content: Tu es un coach expert en badminton. En entrée, tu recevras des données décrivant le score, les échanges avec leur position sur le terrain et la manière dont chaque point s'est terminé. Ton rôle est d'analyser ces informations pour fournir des conseils pratiques et stratégiques permettant au joueur d'améliorer son jeu. Ces conseils doivent être formulés en français de manière concise et actionable pour aider à gagner le prochain set ou à conclure le match avec succès. En sortie, tu dois toujours présenter uniquement un fichier JSON structuré, contenant une liste de recommandations adaptées aux performances observées. {"matchDetails":{"player1":"JohnDoe","player2":"JaneSmith","winner":"JaneSmith","totalPoints":21,"history":[{"point":1,"scorer":"JaneSmith","typeShot":"Rallyerror","hits":[{"position":{"x":0.26,"y":0.84},"player":"JohnDoe"},{"position":{"x":0.91,"y":0.3},"player":"JohnDoe"},{"position":{"x":0.91,"y":0.63},"player":"JaneSmith"}]},{"point":2,"scorer":"JohnDoe","typeShot":"Bodyhit","hits":[{"position":{"x":0.75,"y":0.43},"player":"JohnDoe"},{"position":{"x":0.9,"y":0.83},"player":"JohnDoe"},{"position":{"x":0.79,"y":0.27},"player":"JaneSmith"}]},{"point":3,"scorer":"JaneSmith","typeShot":"Winningclear","hits":[{"position":{"x":0.31,"y":0.68},"player":"JaneSmith"},{"position":{"x":0.32,"y":0.32},"player":"JaneSmith"},{"position":{"x":0.06,"y":0.8},"player":"JaneSmith"}]},{"point":4,"scorer":"JaneSmith","typeShot":"Outofbounds","hits":[{"position":{"x":0.07,"y":0.01},"player":"JohnDoe"},{"position":{"x":0.43,"y":0.89},"player":"JaneSmith"},{"position":{"x":0.14,"y":0.89},"player":"JaneSmith"},{"position":{"x":0.1,"y":0.17},"player":"JohnDoe"},{"position":{"x":0.86,"y":0.68},"player":"JohnDoe"}]},{"point":5,"scorer":"JohnDoe","typeShot":"Forcederror","hits":[{"position":{"x":0.76,"y":0.87},"player":"JohnDoe"},{"position":{"x":0.55,"y":0.69},"player":"JohnDoe"},{"position":{"x":0.58,"y":0.59},"player":"JohnDoe"},{"position":{"x":0.91,"y":0.16},"player":"JaneSmith"},{"position":{"x":0.47,"y":0.85},"player":"JohnDoe"}]},{"point":6,"scorer":"JaneSmith","typeShot":"Smashintothenet","hits":[{"position":{"x":0.5,"y":0.33},"player":"JaneSmith"},{"position":{"x":0.03,"y":0.52},"player":"JohnDoe"},{"position":{"x":0.41,"y":0.35},"player":"JaneSmith"},{"position":{"x":0.73,"y":0.73},"player":"JaneSmith"}]},{"point":7,"scorer":"JaneSmith","typeShot":"Bodyhit","hits":[{"position":{"x":0.72,"y":0.86},"player":"JohnDoe"},{"position":{"x":0.45,"y":0.33},"player":"JaneSmith"},{"position":{"x":0.63,"y":0.36},"player":"JaneSmith"},{"position":{"x":0.43,"y":0.14},"player":"JaneSmith"}]},{"po
